description:
Navigating waters when the wind is howling and the sky is threatening is challenging enough ̶ without worrying about what you're wearing. These pants are designed to move with you, running around on deck or taking on rapids. The waterproof-breathable offers protection, so you can forget you're on a boat in a downpour.

  • HyproTex™ 2.5 layer waterproof-breathable fabric
  • Reinforced seat and knees offer additional protection in high-wear areas
  • Fabric is treated with a DWR (durable water repellency) finish to shed precipitation
  • Designed for unrestricted movement and easy layering
  • Neoprene waistband with adjustable hook-and-loop closure for a snug, comfortable fit
  • Thigh pockets keep the essentials handy
name: NRS Endurance Pants - Men's
